title: PBE status and Alpha Client
body: So I was accepted to help out on the Alpha client, but I'm confused as to how I'm supposed to give feedback on anything other than looks. I don't have a PBE account and I cant purchase chests and all that to test the mechanics of the new loot chests. I was wondering if this was normal for a non PBE person to get the alpha launcher?

replies.body: The Alpha Client and PBE are independent campaigns.  Anything that you do on Alpha client is in fact your Live account, not a PBE.  Share your feedback or issues you find with the community through the [alpha boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work)!  Hope that helps clear things up!
